topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521d07963687233b6e60e00#post_5521d07963687233b6e60e00
A bunch of things are contributing to it; not *just* one thing.  The only definitive thing about all of this is that the percentage of people who are single is snowballing out of control.


To put it simply in say fifty years history book's chapter on the 2020's will be titled "how the anti-sexuality movement caused a great depression".

SJWs and radfems are an exaggerated but useful example of this: expecting femininity is sexist, divorce is extremely dangerous for men

Enough! this is the same fear mongering bullshit those lunatics use to claim Global warming is an apocalyptic event, News flash people this fucking species thrived in a mother fucking ice age! before we even had the ability to acquire or use metal, we are not some fragile little flower! we are the closet thing in the known universe to fucking gods! we have forced the planet that created us to yield to our will time and again! We alone have flown beyond it's farthest reaches! Everyone of us is a part of the greatest force this worthless rock has ever seen. start fucking acting like it and not a bunch of children afraid of the fucking boogymen some random asshole told you about!

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521d5b86368724fe88f1900#post_5521d5b86368724fe88f1900
Times were a lot different back then. They didn't have the internet and much of the technology we take for granted today. And the world certainly wasn't as populated as it is now.


"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521d5b86368724fe88f1900#post_5521d5b86368724fe88f1900
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]we are the closet thing in the known universe to fucking gods! we have forced the planet that created us to yield to our will time and again! We alone have flown beyond it's farthest reaches! Everyone of us is a part of the greatest force this worthless rock has ever seen. [/bq]
But we aren't gods. We have limits whether we like it or not. In the end, the laws of the universe and reality has the upper hand. Keep deluding yourself.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521d5b86368724fe88f1900#post_5521d5b86368724fe88f1900
It's not fear mongering if the economically is already shitting itself inside out because of it.  The economy is recovered but it's failed to fix the economic situation for anyone that wasn't the company's ceo.  What I mean by this is don't be surprised if there's another recession in less than ten years because it's become a tale of two cities economically.

Reason why there's probably going to be another recession within a decade summarized as succinctly as possible:
Companies, "woohoo!  Economy is fixed!"
Workers, "What the hell are you talking about?!  The economy is horrible!"
